survey_name: Electric Scooter Sharing Service Feedback Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to gather user feedback on electric scooter sharing services to improve service quality, safety, and user experience.

questions.question_text: How often do you use electric scooter sharing services?
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice radio button for simplicity and ease of response on mobile devices.

script.question_text: How often do you use electric scooter sharing services?

questions.question_text: What factors are most important to you when choosing an electric scooter sharing service? (Select up to 3)
questions.client_notes: Use a multi-choice checkbox format to allow respondents to select multiple options.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: checkbox (MULTI_CHOICE). Maximum of 3 selections allowed.

script.question_text: What factors are most important to you when choosing an electric scooter sharing service? (Select up to 3)

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the availability of scooters in your area?
questions.routing_logic: Appears if respondent answers 'Daily', 'Weekly', or 'Monthly' to Q1
questions.client_notes: Use a Likert scale for measuring satisfaction levels. Ensure the scale is balanced.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the availability of scooters in your area?
script.routing_logic: Appears if respondent answers 'Daily', 'Weekly', or 'Monthly' to Q1

questions.question_text: Have you experienced any safety concerns while using electric scooter sharing services?
questions.client_notes: Use a simple yes/no question to quickly gauge safety concerns.

script.question_text: Have you experienced any safety concerns while using electric scooter sharing services?

questions.question_text: Please describe any safety concerns you have encountered while using electric scooter sharing services.
questions.routing_logic: Appears if respondent answers 'Yes' to Q4
questions.client_notes: Use an open-ended text field to allow detailed responses. Ensure the field is mobile-friendly.

script.question_text: Please describe any safety concerns you have encountered while using electric scooter sharing services.
script.routing_logic: Appears if respondent answers 'Yes' to Q4

questions.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for electric scooter sharing services?
questions.client_notes: Use an open-ended text field to capture qualitative feedback. Encourage detailed responses.

script.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for electric scooter sharing services?
